name: Jitendra Malik, Arthur J. Chick Professor of EECS
research: Jitendra Malik's research focuses on computer vision, robotics, and multimedia computation. His work includes developing algorithms for object recognition, motion analysis, and scene understanding, with applications in autonomous vehicles, robotic perception, and multimedia content analysis.
